title: Love it
text: Works seamlessly! Much better than the Sonos app!

title: What happened to easily editing playlists?
text:
I have been using this app for my Raumfeld since before the Raumfeld app became this “Teufel” thing. Back then, editing a Raumfeld playlist was easy. Now editing a Teufel playlist is stressful. While editing a playlist, I need to gesture with one finger in just the right spot at just the right speed and at just the right direction in order to move the song I want to move. As if that wasn’t enough, I just was moving a few songs in playlist, and for no apparent reason, the playlist has now duplicated and appended itself to itself... What the —-?

Please work on this

title: On the right track
text: I use the Raumfeld App almost every day to stream music to my connected sound systems. It's good, not perfect. Some buttons are too small, some services like Deezer are still missing and you can't use iTunes Match, BUT everything else works great and the developer is adding features on a regular basis. Keep up the good work, Teufel!

title: Doesn’t support multiple networks
text: We have Raumfeld system in our house and in an apartment.  Two different networks.  Both configured correctly but Raumfeld only remembers the last network setup.   We own 5 wireless speakers, love them but now app is limiting us to use only in one location.   PLEASE FIX.

title: HDMI auto on/off not working after update
text: Have a streaming soundbar that worked great everyday. Installed the updated app and updated device software and now auto on/off via HDMI CEC from TV no longer works!!
